== Bio ==
Rob Pennington, the Deputy Director for NCSA, oversees the activities in
all of NCSA's directorates to ensure that the scientists and engineers
using NCSA's resources and services see a unified, seamless environment
that brings the most advanced technologies to bear on their problems. He
is also responsible for coordinating major campus- and region-wide
efforts to build an integrated cyberinfrastructure and he continues to
lead the center's Innovative Systems Laboratory. Rob has led several
NeIC efforts to produce reports on Nordic e-infrastructure needs and
use, the latest and being the Cognitus project to produce the Nordic
scientific case for high perfomance computing.
